utterance.content: for which journey do you wish to purchase a ticket
a journey from Liverpool to Newcastle
either the 12:17 or 12:22 on Saturday the 4th of Oct...
do you hold a current debit or credit card
and do you have a railcard at all
it's a Super Saver return i think i need
i'm just going to check the 12:17 from Liverpool Lime Street arrives in Newcastle
and that's Saturday the 3rd of October
i think it's the 17:20 leaves Newcastle
arriving at 20:56 in Liverpool Lime Street
the cheapest fare is 41 pounds 40 return
if you miss any services that i'm going to reserve you on
you are able to get the next available train
if you have to cancel your ticket
it's a full refund less 5 pounds
could you give me a contact telephone number please
the one for day time is 9 9 1
i can give you a home phone number as well if you want
your postcode to where your credit card is registered to
and confirm the address for me please
when you said confirm it i thought it'd come up on your screen there
would you like smoking or non-smoking
you're travelling from Liverpool Lime Street to Newcastle on Sunday
it's actually booking me in non-smoking
that's the best available that i can get
the train departs at 12:22 on Saturday
returning from Newcastle to Liverpool Lime Street on Saturday the 4th of October
so it must be only non-smoking trains that are available
i can i can manage that
i'm just going to go over to double check what i've booked there with you
it's Liverpool to Newcastle on the 3rd of October
returning Sunday the 4th of October from Newcastle to Liver... Liverpool Lime Street at 17:20
and what type of credit card is that you hold
you need to take your credit card with you
you collect your tickets 45 minutes before departure time at the booking office in Liverpool Lime Street
and you need to take your credit card and quote this reference number
do you have your pen ready
